Dynamics 365 Solution Architects - I have a new opportunity for a prestigious Client in Hampshire! - LinkedIn post
Post Details:
Steve StylesStatus is online Steve Styles • 1st Recruitment Consultant at Nigel Frank International 3d Dynamics 365 Solution Architects - I have a new opportunity for a prestigious Client in Hampshire!
- 6 month initial contract - £500-£600 per day - Greenfield implementation - Opportunity to be working with the latest Microsoft tech
The Client is implementing Dynamics 365 and replacing their legacy systems. Previous experience of architecting and implementing D365 online end-to-end is essential.
Please do get in touch to apply:
